interface_addresses.query: SELECT interface, address, mask, broadcast FROM interface_addresses WHERE address NOT LIKE '169.254.%' AND address NOT LIKE '127.%' AND interface NOT LIKE '%Loopback%';

interface_details.query: SELECT interface, mac, mtu, type, flags FROM interface_details WHERE interface NOT LIKE '%Loopback%' AND mac != '';
interface_details.description: Network interface details including MAC addresses
